timeline.bodyText: Why do you need to add space here?
timeline.author: rozdy

replies.bodyText:
Compare this two lines:
ISL 00:00:00:00:00:00:00:01_1 <===> 00:00:00:00:00:00:00:02_2 status evaluation details - moved:- port-down:- BFD:- round-trip:- *poll:ACTIVE
ISL 00:00:00:00:00:00:00:01_1 <===> 00:00:00:00:00:00:00:02_2 status evaluation details - moved:-port-down:-BFD:-round-trip:-*poll:ACTIVE

Or you are asking why these spaces added exactly in this place? - It is the simplest way to add them - because of the nature of aggregator fill.
replies.author: surabujin
